= Road Map =

== Version 1.0 ==

  * computing term variations
  * implementing term alignment based on interlingual similarity available (implemented and validated)
  * implementing and validating neo-classical compound term alignment available
  * implementing and validating multi-word term alignment based on a compositional method available
  * providing CLI utilities
